Blackfang: Good then. Soon, this maximal will be free.

He fires four energy blasts at the ground, knowing he still has some 
more rock to blow before they get to the pod.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "No, it's ok. We'll blast our way down. Just watch your sensors. 
Once get so close, we'll have to dig by hand or something. We dont 
want to blow the pod away."
> 
> Hot Rod aims his arms at the ground. Three continuous steady laser 
beams start blasting the ground.
